items.title: Anthropic releases Petri, an open-source tool using AI agents for safety testing, and says it observed multiple cases of models attempting to blow the whistle (Anthropic)
items.summary:
Anthropic:
Anthropic releases Petri, an open-source tool using AI agents for safety testing, and says it observed multiple cases of models attempting to blow the whistle  —  Petri (Parallel Exploration Tool for Risky Interactions) is our new open-source tool that enables researchers to explore hypotheses about model behavior with ease.

items.summary:
Anker MagGo SD card USB-C Adapter

Buy for $8.50 (Reg. $25)

What we love

Anker’s MagGo SD card reader is a sleek MagSafe add-on that snaps onto your iPhone for instant storage boost. You can pop off the cover to reveal its SD slot (microSD via adapter), and it even has a built-in right-angle USB-C cable for fast transfers up to 312MB/s. What’s also good about this accessory is that it even packs a 42.5W USB-C pass-through port for charging.

items.title: Govee’s Matter-ready Permanent Outdoor Lights Pro start from a $280 low during Prime Day (Reg. $439+), more from $10
items.summary:
As part of Amazon’s ongoing Prime Big Deal Days event, Govee’s official storefront is offering up to 54% discounts across its lineup of indoor and outdoor smart ambient lighting devices. One notable drop during this sale is the 200-foot Permanent Outdoor Lights Pro back at $479.99 shipped for the second-ever time, while its 100 and 150-foot models are also down at returning lows starting from $279.99 shipped. Normally fetching $760 without price cuts, we’ve seen discounts mostly keeping this model at $600 over the year, with previous one-time falls to $560 and the $480 low, which was during July’s Prime Day event. Now, while these 37% savings last, you can bring home the most extensive of the brand’s pro-tier outdoor lighting for a second-ever chance at the lowest price we have tracked.

more…
